h1_title: How to Find All Buddha's Eyes Locations and Unlock Secret Boss
h2_title: How to Find All Buddha's Eyes
content: Go over to the other side and climb up the stairs. Take out the enemies using ranged attacks, and climb to the very top of the structure to find the Buddha Head.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Find_All_Buddha's_Eyes_Locations_and_Unlock_Secret_Boss.md', within the main section titled 'How to Find All Buddha's Eyes Locations and Unlock Secret Boss', specifically from the subsection 'How to Find All Buddha's Eyes' and the sub-subsection 'Buddha’s Eyes 2'.
The content is as follows:
Go over to the other side and climb up the stairs. Take out the enemies using ranged attacks, and climb to the very top of the structure to find the Buddha Head.
